Disposal Reason: End of life (hardware obsolete; battery degraded)
Disposal Method: Certified WEEE disposal with hard drive destruction
Data Sanitization Method: 7-pass DoD 5220.22-M wipe + physical hard drive shredding
Notes: Laptop 5 years old; battery life <2 hours; replaced with new model; hard drive removed and shredded; chassis recycled; certificate of destruction received and filed
Contained project documentation (confidential); physical destruction ensured data unrecoverable; certificate obtained

Notes: Cracked screen; out of warranty; factory reset performed; Find My iPhone disabled; iCloud signed out; SIM card removed; traded to Apple (data wiped per Apple standards)
